auth.verifyEmailDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address.
auth.emailSent: A reset email has been sent to:
auth.emailSentDesc1: We've sent a password reset link to
auth.emailSentDesc2: Please check your email and click the link to reset your password
auth.emailSentWarning1: The link will expire in 15 minutes
auth.emailSentWarning2: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder
auth.emailSentWarning3: Click the link in the email to complete your password reset
auth.verifyEmailSuccessTitle: Email has been verified. Please sign in
auth.verifyEmailFailedTitle: Failed to verify email. Please contact support

organizations.slugName: Your org's unique identifier (visible to others)

unverified.title: Organization not verified
unverified.message: The organization has not been verified by admin team yet. Please wait for an hour. Or contact support.

banned.title: Organization banned
banned.message: The organization has been banned. Please contact the support team.

validations.imageRequired: Please upload a profile photo (Must be less than 5MB)
validations.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validations.dateOfBirthRequired: Please enter your date of birth
validations.slugRequired: Please provide a unique identifier (e.g, microsoft-corporation)

apiSuccess.signUpSuccess: Please check your inbox to verify your email
apiSuccess.verifyEmailSuccess: Your account has been verified. Please sign in
apiSuccess.forgotPasswordSuccess: A reset email has been sent to your email
apiSuccess.resetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully
apiSuccess.createOrgSuccess: The org has been created. Please wait for the approval by the Admin Team

apiError.signUpFailed: Failed to complete signup. Please try again
apiError.verifyTokenExpired: Verification token has expired. Please request a new verification email
apiError.verifyEmailFailed: Failed to verify email. Please try again
apiError.accountNotVerified: Account is not verified. Please check your inbox to verify
apiError.invalidatedToken: Token has been invalidated. Please sign in again.
apiError.temporaryLocked: Account temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please try again later or reset your password.
apiError.accountDisabled: Account has been disabled. Please contact support team
apiError.tooManyRequest: Too many request. Please try again in 1 hour
apiError.unauthorized: You are not authorized to do this action
